snippet: Arkansas senior tight end Jeremy Sprinkle was suspended from the Belk Bowl game Thursday night against No. 18 Virginia Tech after police accused him of shoplifting from the department store that sponsors the game....
lead_paragraph: Arkansas senior tight end Jeremy Sprinkle was suspended from the Belk Bowl game Thursday night against No. 18 Virginia Tech after police accused him of shoplifting from the department store that sponsors the game.

headline.main: Player Suspended From Belk Bowl for Shoplifting at Belk
headline.print_headline: Player Suspended From Belk Bowl for Shoplifting at Belk
